TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TiffBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class TiffBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

Docs.summary: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) format images.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap format supports frame level thumbnails, multiple frames, and frame level metadata. It does not support global preview, global thumbnails, or global metadata.
Encoding does not work in partial trust. See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapEncoder> to encode a new bitmap image.
[!code-cpp[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TiffBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/TiffEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TiffBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/TiffEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TiffBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/TiffEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Imaging::TiffCompressOption Compression { System::Windows::Media::Imaging::TiffCompressOption get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Imaging::TiffCompressOption value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the type of compression that is used by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] image.
Docs.value: One of the values. The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption.Ccitt3>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption.Ccitt4>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption.Rle> values require that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat> value be set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.BlackWhite%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapEncoder.Compression%2A> property.
[!code-cpp[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TiffBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/TiffEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TiffBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/TiffEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TiffBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/TiffEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
